ruleset.name: Basic POM
ruleset.description: The Basic POM Ruleset contains a collection of good practices regarding Maven's POM files.

rule.name: ProjectVersionAsDependencyVersion
rule.message: Do not use project's version to express a dependency's version.
rule.description: Using that expression in dependency declarations seems like a shortcut, but it can go wrong. By far the most common problem is the use of ${project.version} in a BOM or parent POM.

rule.name: InvalidDependencyTypes
rule.message: By default, Maven only recognized the following types: $validTypes.
rule.description: While Maven will not failed if you use an invalid type for a dependency in the dependency management section, it will not also uses the dependency.

property.name: xpath
property.value: //dependencyManagement/dependency/type/text[not(contains('pom, jar, maven-plugin, ejb, war, ear, rar, par',@Image))]
